name: Hourglass Stories
description:
Enter the strange and wonderful world of the hourglass: a place that offers deep woods as well as bustling markets, weird creatures and baby goats.

This is a collection of interactive short stories. Step into the hourglass lands and turn your phone to choose a path.

If you want to help us develop the game, we would love to hear your opinions through this short questionnaire: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe54ZGgPTMmahnSH9s3jdXChi2arqSK-ivh2X13...
